io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client

Class HalCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.HalCrawler

  • public class HalCrawler
extends Object
    A crawler that recursively loads all resources that are linked from the services entry point.
